text: The email that users get says "If you have questions or received this in error, please contact the admin" with a link to a super admin's email address. How is that admin picked? Is that something we can change?
The "contact the admin" message also appears on the login and registration pages
The admin is the first super admin we find on the portal. We are in the process of adding customization to this feature and one of the settings will be the admin email address.
If I just remove that super admin and re-add him, will it go to the second one (and so on)?
Or is it not based on that

Im not sure if that will work, but you can give it a try. If you really can't wait for the customization settings to be released, you can DM me your portal id and the email address you'd like to be shown there.
